channel.title: [639] Dementhium - Bosses help
channel.description: I am currently trying to figure out how I would make it where bosses will alternate between the player's they attack. for example if there's 3 players all attacking bandos, he will only attack player 1, I want him to alternate between attacking the 3 players instead of focusing on just one. All help is appreciated!
